bibl.title: Ships and Ships' Fittings.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Hull remains. - 2. Shipbuilding, maintenance and repair in the Roman era. - 3. Rigging components from Myos Hormos / Quseir al-Qadim. - 4. Maritime rock art from Wadi Quseir al-Qadim. - 5. Maritime activities in the Roman period.

bibl.title: Myos Hormos - Quseir al-Qadim. Roman and Islamic Ports on the Red Sea. Volume 2: The Finds from the Excavations 1999-2003

bibl.seg: Lucy Blue & Julian Whitewright, Ships and Ships' Fittings.

David Peacock & Lucy Blue (edd.), assisted by Julian Whitewright, Myos Hormos - Quseir al-Qadim. Roman and Islamic ports on the Red Sea. Volume 2: The Finds from the Excavations 1999-2003 = University of Southampton. Series in Archaeology. 6 = BAR International Series. 2286 (Oxford, 2011) pp. 179-203, 2 tabl., 2 graphiques, 20 figg., 1 carte.

Introduction. - 1. Hull remains. - 2. Shipbuilding, maintenance and repair in the Roman era. - 3. Rigging components from Myos Hormos / Quseir al-Qadim. - 4. Maritime rock art from Wadi Quseir al-Qadim. - 5. Maritime activities in the Roman period.
